name: Barrier Down
description:
Submitted for the Brackey Game Jam.

Controls:

Left Mouse: Move

Right Mouse: Shoot

Q / 1: Root Enemies

W / 2: Speed Buff

E / 3: Teleport

R / 4: Heal

F: Skills Menu

ESC: Pause

Notes:

Action RPG. I didn't have enough time to make the boss fight I planned, but the core gameplay is sort of there. The enemies respawn after a minute. Hover over things for tooltips and let me know how the gameplay feels. It was tough to make a game like this in a week and it was my first time using Unreal's AI and Navigation. Unreal Engine has a ton of weird stuff with how navigation gets generated so there are going to be places I missed masking out, but it should generally work somewhat well. 

Thank you for checking out the game.

Many assets used from quaternius, some from sakuyo, yughues, and LFA. on https://opengameart.org/
